name: Girl Blonde
description:
Girl Blonde

- It's a nice 3D platformer with a side view. In it you have to play for a girl-blonde and gather fruits, vegetables and other sweets! That would pass the level you must collect a certain number of items, but it is not easy to do because you will interfere with obstacles.

Key features:
- 1602 achievements
- Short levels
- Exciting mechanics
- Nice sound!
